general_info.summary: This document provides a list of various programs, schools, reports, and initiatives at Sharda University, covering academic aspects like the School of Dental Sciences, Medical Sciences, and Nursing, as well as administrative and student-focused elements such as examination reports, academic bank of credits, curricula feedback, university brochures, and details about university leadership, history, and tenders. It also highlights student development initiatives including capacity building, skill enhancement, language and communication skills, soft skills, entrepreneurship, innovation, and FM radio. Furthermore, it includes practical guidelines for students regarding visas and medical insurance, information on observership programs, mentoring portals, COVID-19 updates, international campuses in Uzbekistan and Agra, courses on human values, and the National Cyber Crime Reporting Portal.

sample_papers.summary: This text indicates that sample papers are available for SUAT 2025.

career_path.summary: This text outlines career opportunities following a mass communication course, including roles like Radio Producers, Anchors, TV Broadcasters, and TV Producers. It also highlights that students from this program typically receive an average annual salary package ranging from 3.20 LPA to 6.00 LPA, encouraging individuals to pursue a career in this field.
career_path.raw_content:
Career path you can choose after the course
• Radio Producers
• Anchors
• TV Broadcasters
• TV Producers
Students of this programme are placed in companies with an average annual package of 3.20 LPA to 6.00 LPA
Take the next step towards a career in mass communication.
